ISSUE.TITLE: Move back to browscap.org or ua-parser to detect search crawlers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: UserAgentStringLibrary library is used to parse information about user agents located at \App_Data\uas_20140809-02.ini file. Both of them (DLL and INI files) were downloaded at http://user-agent-string.info (was available for free). Now I see that this project is moved to https://udger.com/ on November 2014 with sone new pricing options. We cannot continue usage of the new project because of its new license and pricing option (confirmed by its owner). He recommended to use a classic http://browscap.org/ (as it was done before) Some code and suggestions at https://github.com/browscap/browscap/issues/203 and www.gocher.me/C-Sharp-Browscap We can also consider https://github.com/ua-parser/uap-csharp

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Moved the Dynamic.cs file to Nop.Core project
